SlackWorkspaceId.description: The id of the Slack workspace
SlackWorkspaceId.markdownDescription:
The id of the Slack workspace

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[0-9A-Z]{1,255}$  

Update requires: No interruption

SlackChannelId.description: The id of the Slack channel
SlackChannelId.markdownDescription:
The id of the Slack channel

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ConfigurationName.markdownDescription:
The name of the configuration

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9-_]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

IamRoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role that defines the permissions for AWS Chatbot
IamRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the IAM role that defines the permissions for AWS Chatbot

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,62}:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9:_/+=,@.-]{0,1023}$  

Update requires: No interruption

SnsTopicArns.description: ARNs of SNS topics which delivers notifications to AWS Chatbot, for example CloudWatch alarm notifications.
SnsTopicArns.markdownDescription:
ARNs of SNS topics which delivers notifications to AWS Chatbot, for example CloudWatch alarm notifications.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

LoggingLevel.description: Specifies the logging level for this configuration:ERROR,INFO or NONE. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch logs
LoggingLevel.markdownDescription:
Specifies the logging level for this configuration:ERROR,INFO or NONE. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch logs

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^(ERROR|INFO|NONE)$  

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration
Arn.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:chatbot:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9:_/+=,@.-]{0,1023}$  

Update requires: No interruption

GuardrailPolicies.description: The list of IAM policy ARNs that are applied as channel guardrails. The AWS managed 'AdministratorAccess' policy is applied as a default if this is not set.
GuardrailPolicies.markdownDescription:
The list of IAM policy ARNs that are applied as channel guardrails. The AWS managed 'AdministratorAccess' policy is applied as a default if this is not set.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

UserRoleRequired.description: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration
UserRoleRequired.markdownDescription:
Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption
